headline: What Dover’s Recent Portfolio Moves Mean For Its 2025 Valuation Verdict
summary: Wondering if Dover at around $190 a share is still a smart buy, or if the best gains are already behind it? Let us break down what the numbers really say about its value. Over the last month the stock is up 7.0%, adding to a solid 3 year gain of 44.1%, even though the 1 year return is still slightly negative at -4.5%. Recent moves have come alongside Dover tightening its portfolio with bolt on deals in its engineered products and precision components businesses. The company is also...

headline: Is Oppenheimer’s Vote of Confidence and New Data Center Products Altering The Investment Case For Dover (DOV)?
summary: In recent days, Dover attracted renewed attention after Oppenheimer reiterated its positive view following an investor meeting and the company upheld its decades-long dividend record, while subsidiary SWEP introduced two compact brazed plate heat exchangers aimed at fast-growing data center cooling and district energy markets. The launch of these heat exchangers strengthens Dover’s position in energy-efficient thermal management for data centers, a sector increasingly focused on compact,...
